evs.utilities.matrix
Class Matrix

java.lang.Object
  evs.utilities.matrix.Matrix
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.io.Serializable
Direct Known Subclasses:
Matrix1D, Matrix2D, Matrix3D
public abstract class Matrix
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable

An abstract base class for matrices.

Version:
4.0
Author:
evs@hydrosolved.com

Method Detail

hasEquivalentDimensions

public abstract boolean hasEquivalentDimensions(Matrix matrix)
Returns true if the input matrix has equivalent dimensions to this matrix.

Parameters:
matrix - the matrix for comparison
Returns:
true if the matrices have equivalent dimensions

getElementCount

public abstract int getElementCount()
Return the number of elements in the matrix domain.

Returns:
number of elements

deepCopy

public abstract Matrix deepCopy()
Returns a deep copy of the current matrix. Changes in one matrix are not reflected in the other matrix.

Returns:
a deep copy of the receiver.

to1D

public abstract Matrix1D to1D()
Returns a deep copy of the current matrix in 1D form. The matrix is filled row-wise (i.e. one row at a time) and, in the case of a 3D matrix, from the top layer downwards.

Returns:
a deep copy in 1D form.

getMatrixValues

public abstract java.lang.Object getMatrixValues()
Returns the matrix values as a java array of primitives.

Returns:
the matrix values

createNewDenseMatrix

public static Matrix createNewDenseMatrix(java.lang.Object input)
                                   throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Convenience method for returning a new dense matrix from a primitive Java array. Throws an exception if the input is not recognised.

Parameters:
input - the input.
Returns:
a new matrix.
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException

clearValues

public abstract void clearValues()
Sets the matrix values to null (i.e. an empty matrix).

setMatrixValues

public abstract void setMatrixValues(java.lang.Object matrixValues)
                              throws java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
Sets the matrix values with an array of primitives or throws an exception if the object is incorrect.

Parameters:
matrixValues - the matrix values
Throws:
java.lang.IllegalArgumentException
